name: Bubbles - Bubble Shooter
description:
Play Bubble shooter - the classic fun game.

Once you try playing and bursting all the bubbles you will get addicted.

Try to pop all the bubbles and win the game!

For each missed a shot you lose a "life" and after 5 lost "lives" you will get new rows of bubbles.

When you clear all the bubbles of the same colors, you won't get new bubbles from that color.

Multiply your score by winning the game.

To aim better, tap and drag your finger on the screen, move the cross-hairs, and lift your finger from the screen to shoot.
